author: Lyzza
title: Doctors Without Borders Are Now Doctors in Anguish
text: Doctors Without Borders Are Now Doctors in Anguish What a sad article. These truly are brave, strong, beautiful souls. Thanks from Camelot and Hollywood Talent on loan from god Court martials are in order. Court martials are in order. Lame answer, are you twelve years old? Well, they new the risks. Accidents happen in war. "Accident" seems like a strange term for this. Talent on loan from god Originally Posted by Twisted Sister Lame answer, are you twelve years old? No, I just believe that, when gross negligence leads to the deaths of innocent people, those that were responsible should be held accountable. Are you twelve years old ?
